1.name: Gentleman's Agreement
1.description: A reporter pretends to be Jewish in order to cover a story on anti-Semitism, and personally discovers the true depths of bigotry and hatred.

2.name: Out of the Past
2.description: A private eye escapes his past to run a gas station in a small town, but his past catches up with him. Now he must return to the big city world of danger, corruption, double crosses and duplicitous dames.

3.name: Black Narcissus
3.description: After opening a convent in the Himalayas, five nuns encounter conflict and tension - both with the natives and also within their own group - as they attempt to adapt to their remote, exotic surroundings.

4.name: Miracle on 34th Street
4.description: When a nice old man who claims to be Santa Claus is institutionalized as insane, a young lawyer decides to defend him by arguing in court that he is the real thing.

5.name: Nightmare Alley
5.description: The rise and fall of Stanton Carlisle, a mentalist whose lies and deceit prove to be his downfall.

6.name: Crossfire
6.description: A man is murdered, apparently by one of a group of demobilized soldiers he met in a bar. But which one? And why?

7.name: Gunfighters
7.description: Gunfighter Brazos Kane takes a job on a ranch but he is unjustly accused of killing fellow cowhand Bob Tyrell and must clear himself by finding the real killer.

8.name: The Lady from Shanghai
8.description: Fascinated by gorgeous Mrs. Bannister, seaman Michael O'Hara joins a bizarre yachting cruise, and ends up mired in a complex murder plot.

9.name: I Walk Alone
9.description: Frankie Madison leaves prison expecting a share from his ex-partner. But Prohibition bootlegging didn't prepare Frankie for Big Business.

10.name: Dark Passage
10.description: A man convicted of murdering his wife escapes from prison and works with a woman to try and prove his innocence.

11.name: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
11.description: A clumsy daydreamer gets caught up in a sinister conspiracy.

12.name: Fun & Fancy Free
12.description: Jiminy Cricket hosts two Disney animated shorts: "Bongo," about a circus bear escaping to the wild, and "Mickey and the Beanstalk," a take on the famous fairy tale.

13.name: The Paradine Case
13.description: A happily married London barrister falls in love with the accused poisoner he is defending.

14.name: The Ghost and Mrs. Muir
14.description: In 1900, a young widow finds her seaside cottage is haunted and forms a unique relationship with the ghost.

15.name: Born to Kill
15.description: A calculating divorcée risks her chances at wealth and security with a man she doesn't love by getting involved with the hotheaded murderer romancing her foster sister.

16.name: The Two Mrs. Carrolls
16.description: An artist forms an attachment with a woman on holiday in the country. As the relationship develops, his behavior and information about his past cause her increasing concern.

17.name: Kiss of Death
17.description: Nick Bianco is caught during a botched jewellery heist. The prosecution offer him a more lenient sentence if he squeals on his accomplices but he doesn't roll over on them. Three years into the sentence an event changes his mind.

18.name: Life with Father
18.description: A financier from New York rules his numerous family, consisting of his wife and his four sons, with the meticulousness of a bookkeeper.

19.name: Angel and the Badman
19.description: Quirt Evans, an all round bad guy, is nursed back to health and sought after by Penelope Worth, a Quaker girl. He eventually finds himself having to choose between his world and the world Penelope lives in.

20.name: The Red House
20.description: An old man and his sister are concealing a terrible secret from their adopted teen daughter, concerning a hidden abandoned farmhouse, located deep in the woods.

21.name: Odd Man Out
21.description: A wounded Irish nationalist leader attempts to evade police following a failed robbery in Belfast.

22.name: Dead Reckoning
22.description: A soldier runs away rather than receive the Medal of Honor, so his buddy gets permission to investigate, and love and death soon follow.

23.name: Unconquered
23.description: Intrepid frontiersman Chris Holden foils the political and personal ambitions of renegade Martin Garth in the Ohio Valley following the French and Indian War.

24.name: The Bishop's Wife
24.description: An angel in human form enters the life of a bishop in order to help him build a new cathedral and repair his fractured marriage.

25.name: Monsieur Verdoux
25.description: A suave but cynical man supports his family by marrying and murdering rich women for their money, but the job has some occupational hazards.

26.name: T-Men
26.description: Two US Treasury agents hunt a successful counterfeiting ring.

27.name: Mourning Becomes Electra
27.description: Eugene O'Neill's updated version of the Oresteia set in New England, after the American Civil War.

28.name: The Late George Apley
28.description: George and Catherine Apley of Boston lead a proper life in the proper social circle, as did the Apleys before them. When grown daughter Eleanor falls in love with Howard (from New York!), ...                See full summary »

29.name: My Favorite Brunette
29.description: Shortly before his execution on the death row in San Quentin, amateur sleuth and baby photographer Ronnie Jackson, tells reporters how he got there.

30.name: Body and Soul
30.description: A talented boxer's young career hits difficult terrain when an unethical promoter takes interest in him.

31.name: Quai des Orfèvres
31.description: Jenny Lamour wants to succeed in music hall. Her husband and accompanist is Maurice Martineau, a nice but jealous man. When he knew Jenny is making eyes at Brignon, an old businessman, in ...                See full summary »

32.name: The Bachelor and the Bobby-Soxer
32.description: A high school girl falls for a playboy artist, with screwball results.

33.name: The Farmer's Daughter
33.description: After leaving her family's farm to study nursing in the city, a young woman finds herself on an unexpected path towards politics.

34.name: Nora Prentiss
34.description: A nightclub singer inspires a doctor to fake his own murder, leading to plenty of complications.

35.name: Brute Force
35.description: At a tough penitentiary, prisoner Joe Collins plans to rebel against Captain Munsey, the power-mad chief guard.

36.name: Forever Amber
36.description: In seventeenth-century England, Amber St. Clair aims to raise herself from country girl to nobility, and succeeds, but loses her true love in the process.

37.name: The Egg and I
37.description: On their wedding night, Bob reveals to Betty that he has purchased an abandoned chicken farm. Betty struggles to adapt to their new rural lifestyle, especially when a glamorous neighbor seems to set her eyes on Bob.

38.name: It Always Rains on Sunday
38.description: An escaped convict tries to hide out at his former lover's house, but she has since married and is reluctant to help him.

39.name: Ramrod
39.description: Violent feud between Connie Dickason, the owner of the Circle 66 ranch and rancher Frank Ivey, the self-proclaimed boss of an otherwise public grazing land.

40.name: Mother Wore Tights
40.description: In this chronicle of a vaudeville family, Myrtle McKinley (class of 1900) goes to San Francisco to attend business school, but ends up in a chorus line. Soon, star Frank Burt notices her ...                See full summary »

41.name: Song of the Thin Man
41.description: Nick and Nora investigate the murder of a bandleader in New York.

42.name: A Double Life
42.description: Anthony John is an actor whose life is strongly influenced by the characters he plays. When he's playing comedy, he's the most enjoyable person in the world, but when he's playing drama, ...                See full summary »

43.name: It Happened on Fifth Avenue
43.description: A homeless New Yorker moves into a mansion and along the way he gathers friends to live in the house with him. Before he knows it, he is living with the actual home owners.

44.name: Sinbad, the Sailor
44.description: In medieval Persia, during the rule of Caliph Harun-Al-Rashid, Sinbad the Sailor boasts about his latest adventures to his friends.

45.name: Boomerang!
45.description: The true story of a prosecutor's fight to prove the innocence of a man accused of a notorious murder.

46.name: Repeat Performance
46.description: On New Year's Eve 1946, Sheila Page kills her husband Barney. She wishes that she could relive 1946 and avoid the mistakes that she made throughout the year. Her wish comes true but cheating fate proves more difficult than she anticipated.

47.name: Dishonored Lady
47.description: Madeleine Damien is the fashion editor of a slick Manhattan magazine by day and a lively party girl by night. Unfortunately, the pressures of her job, including kowtowing to a hefty ...                See full summary »

48.name: Secret Beyond the Door...
48.description: When a lovely woman and her new husband settle in an ancient mansion on the East coast, she discovers that he may want to kill her.

49.name: Green Dolphin Street
49.description: Sophie loved Edmund, but he left town when her parents forced her to marry wealthy Octavius. Years later, Edmund returns with his son, William. Sophie's daughter, Marguerite, and William ...                See full summary »

50.name: Desert Fury
50.description: The daughter of a Nevada casino owner gets involved with a racketeer, despite everyone's efforts to separate them.
